summary: Rainbow press reporter Ludo is sentenced to 8 months, but is released on probation. But he has to work 300 hours for a local daycare center and meets Anna who has unfinished business with him.
cast: Til Schweiger|Nora Tschirner|Matthias Schweighöfer|Alwara Höfels|Jürgen Vogel|Rick Kavanian|Armin Rohde|Wolfgang Stumph|Christian Tramitz|Barbara Rudnik|Zora Holt|Gregor Bloéb|Nina Proll|Pasquale Aleardi|Sonsee Neu|Wladimir Klitschko|Yvonne Catterfeld|Emma Schweiger|Fahri Yardim|Lena Amende|Anne-Sophie Briest|Claudia Fritzsche|Volker Hohmann|Bilal Kamarieh|Daniel Krauss|Florentine Lahme|Kai Lentrodt|Stephan Luca|Evelyn Meyka|Tyra Misoux|Allegra Osmani|Paula Paul|Georg Prädikow|Niels-Bruno Schmidt|Barbara Schöneberger|Steffen Schroeder|Paul Maximilian Schüller|Lilli Schweiger|Luna Schweiger|Valentin Schweiger|Lissy Tempelhof|Jeanne Tremsal|Elena Uhlig|Brigitte Zeh|Zoe Moore|René Böhnke|Johannes Halonen|Lars Joermann|Philipp Kubitza|Florian Paetzel|Johannes Pautzke|Ulrich Wohlleben
title: Un conejo sin orejas
